weekly_top_story.headline: President Trump Brokers Deal with Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk on GLP-1 and Other Prescription Drug Prices
weekly_top_story.summary: The White House announced a major agreement with Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk to align U.S. prescription drug prices with international standards, targeting significant cost reductions for GLP-1 medications and others, marking a pivotal step in drug affordability efforts.

stories.headline: Congress Reaches Funding Agreement to End Federal Shutdown and Resume Critical Health Operations
stories.summary: Congress passed a funding deal extending government operations through January 30, 2026, restoring Medicare telehealth flexibilities and health program funding critical to healthcare delivery.

stories.headline: Los Angeles County Public Health Investigates Possible Local Spread of Clade I Mpox After Third Case
stories.summary: Following the confirmation of a third locally acquired Clade I mpox case in Los Angeles County, public health officials urge vaccination with the JYNNEOS vaccine to prevent further spread among high-risk populations.
